dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF_ITEM_NOS
dao.statement: select item_nos as value, item_sna as display from service_rf a inner join servtype_rf b on a.athena_id = b.athena_id and a.hotel_cod = b.hotel_cod and a.serv_typ = b.serv_typ where a.athena_id = ? and a.hotel_cod = ? and a.account_sta = 'Y' and a.system_typ = 'HFD' and a.data_typ = 'N' and a.income_sta = 'Y' and a.serv_typ <> '98' and a.item_nos not in ( 's999', 's998') and b.use_typ in ('1', '2')

dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF_SERV_NOS
dao.statement: select item_nos serv_nos, item_sna from service_rf a inner join servtype_rf b on a.athena_id = b.athena_id and a.hotel_cod = b.hotel_cod and a.serv_typ = b.serv_typ where a.athena_id = ? and a.hotel_cod = ? and a.account_sta = 'Y' and a.system_typ = 'HFD' and a.data_typ = 'N' and a.income_sta = 'Y' and a.serv_typ <> '98' and a.item_nos not in ( 's999', 's998') and b.use_typ in ('1', '2');
